description:
Bob and Doug must go back to High School before they can reclaim their jobs as bin men on a garbage truck.


Series Info:

Bob & Doug is a half hour animated comedy starring Bob & Doug McKenzie (Dave Thomas and Dave Coulier). The show features the adventures of Bob and Doug and their friends in the Canadian town of Maple Lake and beyond.
